name: Hope Squadron (Pico-8)
description:
Hope Squadron

This adorable co-op schoot 'm up tells the story of a girl's last hope to cure her mother from a terrible illness.

Play alone or together, shoot for a high-score. Can you defeat the virusses and fullfill the dream of curing mom?

CONTROLS: 

P1

Move:  Arrow keys

Shoot: N

Switch Weapon (only in Single Player): M

P2

Move:  E,D,S,F

Shoot: Left-Shift

Special thanks to Sonja van Vuure & Wytze Kamp for testing and providing feedback!
